long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to automatically save your work on PebblePad. It saves the hassle to press the "SAVE" button every time to save your work. Now you can select the time frame of your convince and not get annoyed by autosave saving your work every 60 seconds! 

How to use:
-Press "Enable Auto-Save" button to start autosaving.

-To change time frame simply use plus and minus button and press "Save Time Frame" button to save the changes.

-No need to Disable the autosave and make changes and then enable it. Simply make changes while the autosave is enabled. The changed time frame will be effective after the current cycle is complete.
